captions.text: Tell me.

Boss, girl is not at her
relatives place too.
Don't know where she is hiding.
She is not in the girls' hostel too.

They didn't find her there.
Oh no!

Where's your daughter?
- I haven't seen her from three days.

I don't know where and
how my daughter would be.

Old man, do you know,
who liked your daughter? Veeru Bhai!

God father of this city.
King of illegal businesses.
Did you understand who he is?

Sir, we do not match
your status.

I really don't know
where my daughter is.

Your daughter is fortunate that
Veeru Bhai liked her.

Send her to Bhai, she will enjoy,
or she'll turn into ashes.

Veeru Bhai
is looking for you insanely.

The thought of you being caught
by him sends chills to my soul.
You said, you love a guy.

Does that guy love you?
- More than his life.

Then elope with that guy, right away.
Far away from here.
Go and live your life.

Did you get time today
to call me after three days?

Where are you right now?
- Standing outside your house.
A goon is after you.

You didn't tell me about it.
Why?

Do you really love me or are you
marrying me fearing that goon?

Why are you quiet?
Come with me.
Where are you taking me?
He has seen only you.

Today he will see me too.
- No Satya, I'm scared.
I don't want bloodshed.
What do you want from me?

Boss, that girl has a boyfriend.
They both are marrying tomorrow.
Listen, go and get that girl.

You reached to the wrong place
at the wrong time.
Satya!
Deepti?
Deepti!
Deepti!
Deepti!
Deepti!
Deepti!

You want the girl?
Take her.
If you have guts, take her!
Satya?

Satya, I'm scared
to see you like this.

I don't want fighting and bloodshed.
I want only you.

Until you are with me,
I will live.
I love you.

Take me away from here.
I don't want to stay here.
Please.
Are you happy? - Yes.

Boss, I'm Munna speaking.
- What happened?

They both have boarded
a bus to Hyderabad.
You had hidden your daughter.

I can do anything
to save my daughter.
No! No!
Leave me! Leave him!
Leave him!
Inspector.. - Yes, Bhai.

Husband suspected his wife, so he
killed her and committed suicide.

This should be
tomorrow's headlines.
Sanju. - Yes, brother.

That girl cheated me and
I don't like Satya's face.

Tonight they're leaving to Hyderabad.
You understand? - Yes, brother.

If that girl cannot belong to me,
then no one can get her.

Bhai,
the bus is coming towards you.
What's happening?
Deepti, come on. Come on.
Who are you? - Move!

Why did you stop the bus?
- Shut up and sit down.
Hey, what hooliganism is this?
Hey!
Satya!
Satya!
Hey, leave her.
Please.
Please.

Happy journey.
- Wait.
Deepti..
Deva.. torch the bus.

Many people have died
in this accident.

Hey, come here.
He is alive.
Oh my God.
Call Dr. Shailaja immediately.

Doctor, did you see the patient?
- Yes, I saw.
70% burn injuries.
Half of the face is totally burnt.

His facial tissues
are being exposed to air.
So, his brain can get infected.
Even his vocal cords are infected.
He has deep wounds on his body.

This was an accident, right?
- No one escaped in that accident.

But I don't understand,
how is he alive till now?

He wants to live.
He wants to live.
I don't think it is possible.

When he has not lost hope,
why are you losing hope?

It's not our duty?
- But doctor, the patient is in coma.

None of his friends or relatives
came enquiring about him.

If something happens to him,
who will take the responsibility?
He is my responsibility.
Stop it. Stop it, please.
Please!

This is not your life..
it is mine.

I have given this life to you.
So, calm down.
Please.
Sister..
Open your eyes.

You wouldn't have got
so many surprises in life.
Be ready for it.

Your operation was not common,
it was very complicated.
Have patience for few days.
You'll understand everything.
Doctor!
Thank you.

If we can't find him, the reputation
of the hospital will be ruined.
What should we do now?
Find him! Find him at any cost.

'Deepti, Satya, this is not just
a house, but a temple.'
Hero, you've come to buy this flat.
Deal closed. Flat is sold. Bye.

Have you heard the proverb,
everyone is after one?

The same thing is happening
with this flat.
Sir, are you Satya?

I'm a beggar. It was too hot outside,
so I came inside and sat.

I'm calling the people
to give me alms.

Sir, why do you feel offended?
You look like human and not a monkey.
I was just confirming.

Didn't I tell you the flat is sold?
Who are you? - Sat..
I'm Satya's friend.

'Why did he come now?
I can't even pretend as Satya.'

'If he learns that I'm not Satya,
I'll be in trouble.'

'The deal will be ruined.'
- Is your friend here?

Yes, my friend. My childhood friend.
He used to wear my brief when young.

What's your problem?
Go away!

Okay. - Come with money
next time you come.
Come inside. What's your name?
Ram. - Do you know who I am?
Satya's uncle.

I brought him up and
made him a body builder. Hello.

He is very scared of me
that he pees.

If it is your friend's house,
will you come here anytime?

Okay.. stay here with discipline.
I'll tolerate you only for two days.

If you stay a second more,
I will kick you out from here.

Hey, where are you going?
Stay in that corner.

Don't you hear me?
Are you deaf?
'Open sesame. Secret room.'

'Had I known, I would've demanded
10 lakhs more from that fatso.'
Did Satya tell you about this room?

He is like women.
He can't hide things.

Why have you come here?
Do you've interview or anything else?
I've come to murder four people.

Brother Deva, I can't find that girl.
She escaped.

Can you tell Veeru Bhai
that she escaped? - No.
Tell me! Then go and find her.
Please. Please, save me.
That tattoo guy wants to kill me.
You please save me. Please.
Oh no!
Why is Veeru Bhai's men after you?
Don't you see I'm a hot girl?
What? - I am hot and beautiful.

When I saw him for the first time,
I thought he was a macho.
Bhai.. - Wow, what a body, sir.
What a body.

Can I have a photo with you?
Please. - Yes.
Click a photo.
Thank you.
Deva, I'm hungry.

Since that day he has made
my life miserable.

Since he is behind me,
people around me..

..I mean, handsome guys,
don't look at me.

Moreover, he came home and
threatened my parents.

Anyways, you saved me from him.
Thanks.
What if they come again?

What if they come again? So what?
Let they come, I'll keep escaping.

If they come next time,
tell them you have a boyfriend.
But I don't have one.
So, this is your plan?

If you be my boyfriend,
then you'll have to meet me daily.

But remember, those goons
will follow me everywhere I go.
I want them to follow you.

Tell me something.
What do you do?
I desire to become a heroine.
What?
Do you have a doubt? - No.

By the way, we don't see
beautiful faces in films these days.
Is it 11? - Why?

Just see a black crow will
come out of this black car.

Now a black bull will chew
something and open the door.
Even the sheep will get down.

Boss, a guy is sitting
with that girl.

How does he know we are here
to pick her? Go and get her.
He is coming this way.

Who are you?
What are you doing with her?
How are you related to her?

Whatever may be my relationship with
her, but I'm your brother-in-law.

What did he say?
- He says he is her boyfriend.

Hey, don't waste my time.
Do you know who we are?

Deva.. We are Deva's men.
- What’s the proof?

Proof? Goons don't carry ration card
or Adhar card, get it?

You have to believe us.
- I don't believe you.
Call Deva, I will talk to him.

If you talk to me,
assume you spoke to Deva.

Why did you slap me?
- Not you, I slapped Deva.

What do you mean? - You just said,
Deva and you were same.

It is okay if you slapped me
thinking Deva, had you hit me..
What is this? Why did he slap me?

Boss, he hit Deva Bhai.
Am I right, brother?
You are very smart.
Deva, come. Let's talk.

No, I'm not your friend.
I am not Deva.

You are hitting me thinking Deva.
You talk to Deva directly.

Tell me what's the matter?
- Boss a guy says he's her boyfriend.
He wants to talk to you.

Tell him, talking to you
is like talking to Deva.

When I told him that,
he slapped me.
Boss, he is not ready to listen.

When I argued,
he is asking for proof. Talk to him.
Tell me. - Deva.

What did you say? I didn't hear you.
- Don't act smart. I'm Deva Bhai.

Oh.. I am unable to hear you.
- I'm Deva speaking! Idiot!

Why are you shouting?
Can't you talk softly?
If everyone says, he is Deva..

..how would I know
who real Deva is?

Prove it. - I think he is asking for
Adhar card from boss.

Scoundrel, tell me where you are.
I will come there right away.

Today, I'm not in mood.
We'll meet tomorrow.
Time and place, I will decide that.

Hey, listen. Hello?
Scoundrel!
I gave you two days' time.

One day is over.
Tomorrow if you come here, then..

Will you chew me up?
- Do you doubt?

You said you are here
to kill four people.

Have you killed someone?
- I am going to kill one now.
Is it? Who is he?

Excuse me.
- 'I think he takes me very lightly.'

Why have you brought me here?
- I'm expecting a friend here.

My friend is calling.
Excuse me. - Okay.
Hello? - Hey, I'm Deva speaking.

You called me here.
Look, I'm here.

Deva is not so cheap that
he will come and meet me.

Hey, I am talking from here.
Look behind, I'm sitting in my car.

Look, I'm waiting for Deva.
You go back to where you came from.

Scoundrel, wait!
Where are you going?
Hey, stop.

Come out, scoundrel!
Deva is here.
Where are you hiding?

Who are you?
Tell me who are you?

Why don't you speak?
Who are you?
Tell me who you are.
Ten months ago, 10 at night.

A bus left from Vizhag terminal
to Hyderabad.

There were two people in the bus.
Deepti and Satya.

But brother, who are you?
- Satya!
Is it hurting?

You are experiencing pain
after killing so many people.

But think about that poor girl,
who died unnecessarily.
How much it would've hurt to her.

Talk to him.
- Deva, where are you?
Veeru Bhai, he will kill me.
Who is he?
Who is he?

Hey, search the entire city
and find Deva.
Don't kill me. Let me go.

That day, even I begged to you
to leave Deepti.
Did you leave her?
I made a mistake.

Until today you had fun
killing people.

Now, you'll celebrate
your own death.
Happy journey.
Killer is very smart.
He has used his brains to kill him.

What injustice. People are using
electricity to commit a murder.

People in the city are
yearning for electricity.

Brother, did you get any clue?
- No, sir.

Hey ACP, what's going on?
- The same that you can see.

He has killed you man so cleanly
that he hasn't left any proof behind.
He is like you.

He trapped him and
tied him here.

Whoever it is, looks like
he's a master in planning.

But one thing is sure.
- What?

He could've killed him easily
by shooting or stabbing him.

But he left him to die ruthlessly.
He has rage of revenge.
He is ready to even die.
"I am yellow. Get me blue.."
Who came?

Hero is here. You came empty handed.
Didn't you get chicken?

Fan is not working.
Repair it.

Be alert if you want to
sleep peacefully.

Don't know how many
murderers are around you.
Today's breaking news.

There was a murder in the city
that created commotion.

People fear him
more than murder news.

The one who was murdered was not
common, but Veeru Bhai's man, Deva!

We have to think that neither knife
or gun was used.

He was killed by electrocution.
He was electrocuted to death.

Many murderers may be
roaming around you, be careful.
So, I always tell you,..

..if you have to live peacefully,
keep your eyes open while sleeping.

Because this smart murderer
doesn't need a gun or knife.
A small wire is enough to kill you.

It is possible that fan's wind
may take your life.

It can be a guy with a
personality like a hero.

It is possible that he may be
sitting beside you on the sofa.

When you become careless,
then you'll be kill...

Excuse me,
why did you turn off the TV?
I won't be able to sleep at night.

Sir, knowingly or unknowingly,
I blabbered with you.

Please forgive me thinking me
as your younger brother.
I shall leave. - Where?

I'll be lying in any corner
of your big mansion.

No one other than you knows about me.
If anyone comes to know..

..or you leave the house
without my knowledge..

..your news will be the next
on crime story.

Please, don't give me such
bumper offer. My heart will fail.

Sir, shall I go?
- Where are you going?
I want to pee. Please.
Thank you, sir.

ACP said, somebody did this
to avenge us.
Who can it be?
Who can it be?

Hello? - Bhai, I'm Deva's man
speaking. - Tell me.

I've found out the girl
who you were looking for.

But before I could tell boss,
he died.

Sanju, it is about a girl,
you talk to him.
Tell me.
Where can I find her?

Did you read today's newspaper?
- Veeru's aide killed.

It is good that he died,
or I would've killed him some day.
I am acting too much, right?
Will you act? - What do you mean?

Will you become a heroine?
Want to do acting?

What's there to ask?
Let me get a chance, then see.

Okay, then show me.
- Here?
Director!
Sir.. sir.
Ram has told me about you.

I was waiting to work with you.
- Really?

You are in front of me.
Oh my God, I can't believe this.

When the hero of your movie,
dated with two girls in a film..

..then his wife.. - Karan Johar
was the director, not me.

The coffee guy, who drinks coffee
and makes everyone drink. - Okay.

Okay, that movie was yours where
jeeps fly in air one after the other?

It was not my movie.
Must be Rohit Shetty's.
Which is your movie?

This is my first movie.
My debut.

By the way, who is the hero
of your movie? - I don't know.
Hero is here.

'The number you have dialed
is currently busy on another call.'
Boss.
What is this? - A rose.
Scoundrel. - Giving it with love.
I don't know what she saw in you.

I was trying to woo her,
but I was not able to.

I don't know where she saw you
three months back. Finished.
She made me a side actor.

I don't know what has happened
to the taste of girls these days.
Hey idiot, who are you talking about?
That girl in red color dress.

What is Ram telling him?
- He's explaining the scene to hero.
You are the director, right?

I'm the director,
but he is my director.

But who will explain the scene to me?
- I will tell you, baby.
I am here. - Okay.

You saw the hero
three months ago.
Two months ago, you fell for him.

You want to tell your feelings
to him from a month. - Okay.

Today he is in front of you,
so propose him.

You want to tell him, I love you,
darling.' - Wow, what a scene.

What creativity.
You're brilliant, sir! - Yeah!

Director sir, have you explained her
the scene? - Yes, three months ago..

I explained it to her
as you had instructed me.
Good. Shruti, show me your talent.

I don't want this Shruti for this
scene. You get into the character.

Okay. - By the way,
this is only audition.

If you do well, director will
take you as heroine.
What say, sir? - As you say, sir.
Bless me.
What kind of film is this?

Who is the hero?
- Veeru Bhai's younger brother.

My next target. Don't tell anyone.
- Sir.

Target anyone you want.
But spare this poor man.

Hi.. Actually, three months ago,
when I saw you first time..

..I've lost my heart, mind,
and peace.

I always think about you.
But I will tell it to you today.
I.. love.. you..

Brother, I think that girl would've
spoken rubbish to you.
You don't feel bad.

By the way, you are an
arrange marriage material.

You leave her for me.
I will handle it.
I shall leave. - Hey!
I want that girl at any cost.

Hello director.
Yesterday's scene was wonderful.
Your fun is creating problems to me.

I am tensed, I can't explain
the scene to you.

Director sir, did you tell her scene?
- Did you tell me?

Shruti, the scene is very simple.
Yesterday you proposed the hero..
..today hero will propose you.
Sir, this is the scene, right?

You changed the scene
without my knowledge?

This is cheating.
You should've asked the director.

This heroine
will not work with me then.

What's the situation? Do I have to
run behind the hero, like yesterday?

Wonderful. Yesterday's heroine is
smarter than the director.

Your hero is here.
Go running to him and return.

Sir, I will go right away.
- Stop giving me shocks.
Sir, destiny is so bad.
Don't know when it will ruin him.

He doesn't know that
you are the creator.
You are the creator and fighter.

Story, screenplay,
direction, super hit.
Say something.

Yesterday when you proposed me,
I couldn't sleep last night.

I was tossing and
turning the entire night.

Even I want to tell you something.
- What?
I love you!
What is this, brother?

When I proposed her,
she ran away quietly.
Brother, she is shying from you.
Shying? - Yes.

If a girl runs away with shy,
when a guy proposes her..
..that means, this is a done deal.
That means, she is mine now.

How was it, tell me soon?
- How can I? I don't have words.

I am not even sweating
because of tension.

Director, your taste is very bad.
- Mine.

How can this man be my hero?
- Do you want Mega Star Chiranjeevi?

Hero should be like Ram.
He is prince of every girl's dream.
Macho, stylish, manly..
I think, I love him.
Oh.. the bell rang in your heart.
Hello? - I don't feel good.

Why? - There's a
chemical reaction in my brains.
I don't feel good at all.
I will die if I don't see him.
Brother, there's time for it.
Enjoy until then.
Come in.
What's the matter? - Hello, sir.
Missing case, sir.

My good friend is missing
from past ten days.

Do you have her photo?
- Yes, sir.

Since how many days is
the girl missing? - 10 days, sir.
Are you out of your mind?

This.. that.. wait here,
I will be back.

Tell me, Bala. - We killed
two people ten months back..
Deepti and Satya.
Why are you digging old graves now?

One guy is here to file
a missing complaint..

..that Deepti is missing
from ten days.
Are you out of your mind?

Hey, stop him.
He shouldn't leave.
Get him to me.
Hey!
Stop!
Stop, idiot!
Where are you running?
Get the body down immediately.

So many people are here,
didn't anyone see this incident?
No one?

Somebody would've witnessed
this incident.
Hey! Move!
How did the murderer kill him?
I've come here to tell you the same.
Hey, stop there!
Didn't you hear me?
Who are you? - Satya.
Satya? - Did you recognize me?

Please, don't kill me.
I'm a police officer.

It is police's duty to
control crime.
You are supporting the criminals.
Happy journey!

Can you recognize the murderer?
- As soon as I see him.
Send the sketch artist inside.

Tell him how did he look.
Hurry up.
His left hand was small.
Done, sir.

Is he the same?
- Yes, he is the one.

If we need you again,
you'll have to come here. - Sure.
Wait.

How do you remember
his face in so much detail?

I can never forget this face, sir.
I've seen him very closely.

What happened, ACP?
Any news?
Inspector Bhanu has been murdered.

You are related to
this murder somehow.

ACP, I don't remember how many
people click photos with me.
You are a celebrity.

Yes, by the way, we have
the sketch of the murderer.

'You reached to the wrong place
at the wrong time.'

I don't know him.
- I expected so.
I expected the same answer from you.

Take this.
You need this more than me.

Number 2 is written on
inspector's photograph.
Deva's photo had one written on it.
Take care, Veeru Bhai.

Listen, he is still alive.
Get him!
Where's Satya?

Are you blind? Can't you see?
It's me.
Idiot, I'm asking about Satya.

Even, I'm telling about Satya.
It is me.
Why are you mishandling me?

Idiot, what are you doing
in his house?

That's my house.
I'm the owner of that house.

It was vacant from 10 months,
so I confiscated it. I swear.

Do you know who he is?
- You tell me, sir.
Who else stays at home?

'If they learn that murderer
stays with me, they'll kill me.'
No one, sir. I live alone.

I'm single. I'm looking for girls.
Tell me if you know anyone.
He is crazy.

Get the man who described
the sketch to the ACP.

Bhai, that guy is here.
- Get him here.
'Whose entry?'
'Why has he come here?'

'You killed his men, now you
yourself are informing them.'

'Do you think they'll believe you?
Shut up.'
Wonderful, sir. Wonderful.

Bhai, did you call me?
- Did you see him?

Yes. - He is killing my men
one by one.
'Not him, but he is killing them.'

Did he say something
when he killed him?

Simple, sir.
"Scoundrel, I will kill you."
Dwarf, shut up.

There's no appreciation
for good deed.

I thought I was the only clown,
but he is the same.
Tell me, what did he say?

He said, he wanted to see
fear in your eyes.
By the way, he was not wrong.
I can see fear in your eyes.

I want him. Call me
when you see him again.

I have to stay here with you to
inform about him or get him caught.
But why? - Because Bhai..
..his next target is you.

What did you say?
- Bhai, he said so.

'What acting? Melodramatic.'
- Bhai, I shall leave.

Sir, even I had seen her.
- Where?
In this photo, where else?

We have to do something about him.
I will talk to brother.
Sanju.. - What happened?

We found the girl that
Veeru Bhai was looking for.

Where is she?
- Look, she's crossing the road.

Hey, the girl I love,
my elder brother is eyeing on her.
I don't understand what to do.

If brother knows,
he won't forgive me.
He will kill me. - He won't know.

I mean, you tell about the girl
to your brother, right?

Have patience for few days,
I will handle your brother.

Hey.. you are my true friend.
Thanks.

Hello? - Bhai, I'm Deva's aide.
- Yes, tell me.

Do you remember, I called you
regarding that girl. - Yes, so?

I found that girl, but your
younger brother is crazy about her.

Hey idiot. Do you realize
who you are talking about?

I knew, you wouldn't believe it.
Cut the phone, I'll send you photos.
Hey Sanju..

Deva's aide told me that these days
you are going around with a girl.

No brother,
you've got wrong information.
There’s nothing like that.

You don't worry unnecessarily.
Shall I leave?
Liar!

Brother is suspecting me.
He won't spare me.

Will the problem solve
if you drink like this?
Hey, you don't know my brother.

Had I been in your place..
- What would have you done?
Tell me.. what would have you done?
I would've killed him.
What?

Until when will you spend life
by becoming Veeru Bhai's shadow?

If I sacrifice my love
fearing my brother..
..then shame on my love.
But if I kill Veeru Bhai..
..then two birds with one stone.
First.. my heartbeat will be mine.
And second, Veeru Bhai's position.
Hey! Hey! - Brother..

Only Sanju Bhai will
rule over this city.

Sorry brother.. - Sanju had you
told me that you love that girl..

..then I would've sacrificed
ten girls for you, forget one.

But you tried killing
your elder brother for one girl?

You've got a thought of
killing me in your mind.
This will never leave.

To kill that thought,
I have to kill you. - No, brother.
Ali.. - Yes, Bhai?

Take him from here.
- No, brother. Please, brother.

Forgive me, I'm your younger brother.
Forgive me, brother.
Ali.. - Tell me, Bhai.

I may feel bad and
call you to get him back..

..don't spare him.
Switch off your mobile phone.
Take him far away from here.
Bhai, Deva's aide speaking.

I had told you that he is
crazy about a girl.. - Tell me!

Didn't you understand? I kept
telling you that I'm Deva's aide..

..and I was the one who killed
Deva by electrocuting him.
Satya!

I called Deva at a lonely place
and killed him.

Then I killed inspector Bhanu
by getting him into a mall..
..and hanging him with a rope.

I made your brother fall
for the girl whom you liked.
I kept playing and defeating you.

My game was to get
your brother killed by you.

You! - Don't shout.
I've already played my game.

Think about saving him.
It shouldn't be late.
No, no. Don't kill me, no!
No!
Sanju! Sanju! Get up, my brother.

The one who we love dies in our arms,
it is very painful.

Only then we realize
how helpless we are.
Did you know how it pains?

Hey, when Charan told you, you kicked
on my chest with this leg, isn't it?
Move aside. What is going on here?

We are Dharma's aides.
- So? Will you do as you wish?
He severed my leg.

He threatened us and
did everything possible.
But he couldn't move our courage..

..which you had brightened
in our hearts.
Son, you were true.

He couldn't even move
a brick from here.

The fear that he was
scaring us with..
..he is living in the same fear.
Hey, one week time is over.
Vacate the entire shanty.

Or you know what we did
to that inspector.

You'll meet the same fate.
Vacate this shanty!

Old man, do you wish to get
your other leg severed?

Hey, you threaten me to
severe my other leg?

Where are you running?
Stop!

Your father is back!
Go and tell Dharma!

The courage that my son
gave to the shanty residents..
..they fought for one year.

If he was alive..
- He is alive.
Charan is alive.

Though Satya is alive, he is dead
for everyone from past one year.

But Charan,
who was killed a year ago..
..is alive in everyone's heart.
One has to live like this.
If I couldn't live like him..

..then there won't be any
meaning to my life.
I will live.
Like your son, Charan!
We are in the party rally now.

We have with us their new
youth president, Shakti Thakur.

Sir, how did you
reach this position?

You have to work hard
to become a leader.
There are no short cuts.
The important thing is, trust.
They all trust me.

People betray others
to acquire the position.

Such leaders cannot
survive for long.
The one who betray others are..
Boss, he is here.

If he is alive,
then my career is at stake.
Kill him!

Is this true?
Is your son alive?

You killed him, didn't you?
Don't you trust yourself?

Minister says, he is alive.
This guy says, he is alive.
Are you scared hearing this?
I don't fear!

Since you've known,
you are shivering in fear.

If he comes in front of you,
what will happen to you?

Look for a place to hide..
He is coming.

If he is alive,
then I will kill him so brutally..
..that his soul will shiver.
Dharma Bhai!
He is here, Bhai.
He is here.
But how is he alive?

'Gradually, thousands
of people will stand here.'

'Then I will see the drama
of your death.'

No one should go
from here alive.
Kill everyone!

You've done so much
to stop his atrocities.

one more step and
his kingdom will fall.
Destroy his kingdom!
Stop!

If you step forward,
I will kill your mother!
Stop! Don't come here.
Your mother will die!
Stop!
Sorry, Bhai.

'If you don't wish to die,
you have to kill someone.'

What will I do with the position,
if I am not alive to get it?

When I saw you first time,
I had seen my death.
But I will not die alone.
I will take you along.

You should've seen
before you did this.
Hit them!

He ruined our lives.
Kill him!

I have one more responsibility.
Manju.

She couldn't believe that
Charan is no more.

I was scared that she may
slip into depression.
So, I sent her away from here.
"Freedom."
"Freedom!"
